autoClearSearchValue.description: Whether to clear the search box after selecting items, only effective when multiple is true
autoClearSearchValue.description_zh: 是否在选中项后清空搜索框，只在 multiple 为 true 时有效

bordered.description: Whether there is a border or not

:clearIcon.description: Customize the selection box to clear the icon
:clearIcon.description_zh: 自定义的选择框清空图标

changeOnSelect.description: When this option is true, the value of the menu option will change for each level of the click (only effective in single selection mode)
changeOnSelect.description_zh: （单选时生效）当此项为 true 时，点选每级菜单选项值都会发生变化，具体见上面的演示

:displayRender.description: Select the render function that is displayed
:displayRender.description_zh: 选择后展示的渲染函数

:tagRender.description: Customize the tag content render, which only takes effect when multiple selections are made
:tagRender.type: ({ label: string, onClose: function, value: string }) => ReactNode
:tagRender.description_zh: 自定义 tag 内容 render，仅在多选时生效

popupClassName.description: Customize the name of the floating layer class

:expandIcon.description: Customize the secondary menu expansion icon
:expandIcon.description_zh: 自定义次级菜单展开图标

expandTrigger.description: The submenu can be expanded with a choice of 'click' and 'hover'
expandTrigger.description_zh: 次级菜单的展开方式，可选 'click' 和 'hover'

:fieldNames.description: Customize the Options field for label value children
:fieldNames.description_zh: 自定义 options 中 label value children 的字段

:getPopupContainer.description: The menu renders the parent node. By default, it is rendered to the body
:getPopupContainer.description_zh: 菜单渲染父节点。默认渲染到 body 上，如果你遇到菜单滚动定位问题，试试修改为滚动的区域，并相对其定位

:loadData.description: Used for dynamic loading option and cannot be used with 'showSearch'
:loadData.description_zh: 用于动态加载选项，无法与 `showSearch` 一起使用

:maxTagCount.description: The maximum number of tags to display, responsive mode has a performance penalty
:maxTagCount.description_zh: 最多显示多少个 tag，响应式模式会对性能产生损耗

:maxTagPlaceholder.description: What is displayed when the tag is hidden
:maxTagPlaceholder.description_zh: 隐藏 tag 时显示的内容

:maxTagTextLength.description: The maximum length of the tag text to display
:maxTagTextLength.description_zh: 最大显示的 tag 文本长度

:notFoundContent.description: What is displayed when the drop-down list is empty
:notFoundContent.description_zh: 当下拉列表为空时显示的内容

open.description: Control the visibility and concealment of the floating layer

placement.description: The preset position of the floating layer

:showSearch.description: Displays the search box in the selection box
:showSearch.description_zh: 在选择框中显示搜索框

:suffixIcon.description_zh: 自定义的选择框后缀图标

showCheckedStrategy.description: Define how the selection is backfilled. 'Cascader.SHOW_CHILD': Display only the selected child nodes. 'Cascader.SHOW_PARENT': Display only the parent node (when all child nodes under the parent node are selected).
showCheckedStrategy.description_zh: 定义选中项回填的方式。`Cascader.SHOW_CHILD`: 只显示选中的子节点。`Cascader.SHOW_PARENT`: 只显示父节点（当父节点下所有子节点都选中时）。

:removeIcon.description_zh: 自定义的多选框清除图标

searchValue.description: Set the value of the search, it needs to be used in conjunction with 'showSearch'
searchValue.description_zh: 设置搜索的值，需要与 `showSearch` 配合使用

:dropdownMenuColumnStyle.description: The style of the drop-down menu column

rootClassName.description: Add className to the outermost layer of component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

Option.name: isLeaf
Option.description: Mark as a leaf node, effective when loadData is set. When set to false, it will be forced to mark as a parent node, even if the current node has no children, it will still display the expand icon
Option.description_zh: 设为 false 时会强制标记为父节点，即使当前节点没有 children，也会显示展开图标

showSearch.name: filter
showSearch.description: Receive the two parameters inputValue and path, and return true when path meets the filter conditions, and false if not
showSearch.description_zh: 接收 inputValue path 两个参数，当 path 符合筛选条件时，应返回 true，反之则返回 false

showSearch.name: limit
showSearch.description: The number of search result impressions

showSearch.name: matchInputWidth
showSearch.description: Whether the search result list is the same width as the input box
showSearch.description_zh: 搜索结果列表是否与输入框同宽

showSearch.name: render
showSearch.description_zh: 用于渲染 filter 后的选项

showSearch.name: sort
showSearch.description_zh: 用于排序 filter 后的选项

events.name: onSearch
events.description: Listens to search input, returns the entered value
events.description_zh: 监听搜索，返回输入的值
